articles.title: It’s A Birthday Hangover! Arjun Kapoor Spotted In A Lazy Day Clothing - Gulte
articles.description: Arjun Kapoor, who celebrated his 36th birthday yesterday, is out today in a casual outfit. He looks simple yet stylish. The actor wore black shorts and a white hoodie and rocked in his easy go-to style.
